topics.body: With 15,000 unique and over 38,000 turnstile attendance in 2014, MomoCon is one of the fastest growing all ages conventions in the country. Fans of Japanese Anime, American Animation, Comics, Video Games, and Tabletop Games come together to celebrate their passion by costuming / cosplay, browsing the huge exhibitors hall, meeting celebrity voice talent, designers, and writers behind their favorite shows, games, and comics and much much more over this 4 day event. Whether you are an anime fan, gamer, comic reader, or just like watching cartoons, all are welcome at MomoCon!

Maybe if I were to cosplay myself, or do something worthwhile, but otherwise can't think of a reason tk go

topics.body: I had a crazy thought; imagine a video game where every enemy, even bosses, die in one hit but their ai is so smart that even though they only take one hit to kill the enemies are smart enough to not put themselves in danger and rely on outsmarting you tactically to win to the point if they had regular health the game would be outright impossible to defeat.
